items.title: Liverpool say 'no timetable' for Isak after surgery
items.summary: Liverpool striker Alexander Isak will be sidelined indefinitely after undergoing surgery on Monday on a broken ankle and fibula.

items.title: Salah scores late winner in Egypt's AFCON opener
items.summary: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah scored a stoppage-time goal to give Egypt a 2-1 win over Zimbabwe to start their Africa Cup of Nations campaign on Monday.

items.title: Sources: Madrid's Endrick heads to Lyon on loan
items.summary: Lyon and Real Madrid agreed on Monday to a six-month loan for striker Endrick, sources told ESPN. The loan does not include an option to make the move permanent.

items.title: Kane smashes Arjen Robben record in Bayern rout
items.summary: Harry Kane scored his 30th club goal of the season as Bayern Munich shrugged off an injury and illness crisis to sweep past Heidenheim 4-0 on Sunday and go into the Bundesliga's winter break with a nine-point lead.

items.title: Ra√∫l Jim√©nez dents Nottingham Forest‚Äôs revival to lift Fulham clear of danger
items.summary: Fulham are battling. Marco Silva‚Äôs options are limited and he does not have many ways to freshen up his side, but at least he can count on an experienced core and a group willing to scrap when they are at risk of being dragged towards the relegation zone. It is putting it kindly to say this game will not live long in the memory. It was scrappy, stop-start and overly physical. Both teams were disappointing in the final third and it probably would have finished goalless but for Douglas Luiz‚Äôs rush of blood to the head gifting Raul Jim√©nez to score the goal that lifted Fulham 10 points above the bottom three before their trip to West Ham on Saturday. Continue reading...

items.title: De beste penaltynemer van de Premier League speelt bij Fulham
items.summary: Fulham heeft maandagavond dankzij de specialiteit van Ra√∫l Jim√©nez van Nottingham Forest gewonnen. De spits van de Londenaren bleef zoals altijd koel vanaf elf meter en mag zich de beste penaltynemer van de Premier League noemen.

items.title: Ponderous Fulham hang on to seal narrow victory over Forest
items.summary: Raul Jimenez's first-half penalty moved Fulham 10 points clear of the drop despite an underwhelming showing in their 1-0 win over Nottingham Forest at Craven Cottage.

items.title: 'Extraordinary day' as Chiefs announce plans to move to 'other Kansas City'
items.summary: The Kansas City Chiefs have announced that they will move from their long-time home in Missouri to a domed stadium in the state of Kansas from the 2031 NFL season.

items.title: 'Clinical' Humphries thrashes Lim to progress to third round
items.summary: Luke Humphries thrashed Paul Lim 3-0 with a dominant display in the second round of the World Darts Championship on Monday night.

items.title: Salah bezorgt Egypte op de valreep succesvolle start op de Afrika Cup
items.summary: Egypte heeft zijn eerste wedstrijd op de Afrika Cup gewonnen. E√©n van de favorieten voor de eindzege won maandagavond met 2-1 van Zimbabwe, met dank aan een late goal van Mohamed Slaah. In de andere wedstrijd in Poule B was Zuid-Afrika te sterk voor Angola.

items.title: West Ham latest: Fullkrug flying to Italy to complete Milan medical
Sneijder: 'Ik heb een goed gesprek gehad met Geelen'
items.summary: Wesley Sneijder heeft een gesprek gehad met Menno Geelen over een functie binnen Ajax. Wat die rol precies inhoudt, dat wilde de gewezen middenvelder nog niet verder specificeren.

items.title: Nachtmerrie voor Isak: Liverpool-spits geopereerd aan kuitbeenbreuk
items.summary: Liverpool is Alexander Isak voorlopig kwijt. Uit onderzoek is gebleken dat de Zweedse spits zijn been gebroken heeft in de wedstrijd tegen Tottenham Hotspur (1-2).

items.title: Alexander Isak set to miss several months of season after Liverpool confirm fractured ankle
items.summary: Record signing injured while scoring at Tottenham Swedish striker had surgery after scan on Monday Liverpool‚Äôs record signing, Alexander Isak, is facing several months on the sidelines after undergoing surgery on an ankle injury that included a fractured fibula. Isak sustained the injury as a result of a heavy challenge from Micky van de Ven while in the process of scoring in Liverpool‚Äôs 2-1 win against Tottenham on Saturday. The 26-year-old was helped off in considerable pain and MRI scans confirmed Liverpool‚Äôs initial fears of a serious problem. Continue reading...

items.title: Liverpool striker Isak has surgery on broken leg
items.summary: Scans confirm Liverpool striker Alexander Isak's left leg was broken during the club's victory against Tottenham Hotspur on Saturday.

items.title: Liverpool confirm Isak leg fracture
items.summary: Liverpool have confirmed Alexander Isak suffered a leg fracture during Liverpool's 2-1 win over Tottenham on Saturday.

items.title: Roda klimt naar vierde plek, RKC te sterk voor gebroken Jong Ajax
items.summary: Roda JC Kerkrade heeft de knappe uitzege bij De Graafschap een vervolg gegeven met een driepunter bij Jong FC Utrecht. De Limburgers staan daardoor nu vierde in de Keuken Kampioen Divisie. RKC Waalwijk maakte een einde aan een reeks van drie competitienederlagen op rij, door het gebroken Jong Ajax aan de kant te zetten.

items.title: Fifa tests new technology for ball out of play and offside
items.summary: Fifa is testing new technology which can determine if the ball went out of play before a goal was scored.

items.title: Milan‚Äôs Serie A match in Australia called off after ‚Äòunacceptable requests‚Äô
items.summary: Milan v Como was intended for Perth on 8 February Asian Football Confederation wanted to impose conditions The proposal to play a Serie A match between Milan and Como in Perth, Australia, has been cancelled due to football sanctions and conditions imposed by the Asian Football Confederation (AFC). The game was set to become the first major European domestic league fixture to be played outside its home country but will now not go ahead because of the financial risks and last-minute complications. Continue reading...

items.title: 'Just reach out' - Man Utd's Bennett on his father's suicide
items.summary: Manchester United defender Rhys Bennett discusses his father's death in October to help raise awareness of mental health issues.
